original_text: And the children of Benjamin gathered themselves together after Abner, and became one troop, and stood on the top of an hill.
korean_text: 베냐민 족속은 함께 모여 아브넬을 따라 한 무리를 이루고 작은 산 꼭대기에 섰더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Benjamin gathered themselves together
and stood on the top of an hill
